page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: There is no regular weekly entertain- ment in Hockwold,but both the{Social {club}and{The Red Lion}public house organise social evenings with singers, discos,bar-b-ques and pintable and bar games are available. A{Church Fete}is held annually on the playingfield.Other village organisa- tions run jumble sales,coffee mornings cheese and wine evenings,bingo,discos and dances in the{Village Centre}to raise money for the village or for out-side charities. A{Fun Run}of 10 miles is organised annually by the local publican.Teams from the surrounding district partake and proceeds go to charity. In Autumn l985 the{Baroque Trio}from Weeting gave a music recital in St. James's Church.
